name: 2048 plus – New Version
description:
Find the new amusing tiles:
- STONE BLOCK
- BONUS BLOCK
- DIVISION BLOCK
those make the game more challenging and more funny!

[How to play]
- Swipe to move tiles
- Match two tiles with the same number
- Complete all challenging levels

Two different gameplay mode:
- CLASSIC
- CHALLENGE

CHALLENGING MODE (30 LEVELS):
- play and beat all 30 challenges
- stars ranking system: try to complete all levels with 3 stars
- more levels are coming with next update!

Enjoy!
